alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued November 24 at 4:54AM EST until November 24 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility 1/4 mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Indian River and Saint Lucie Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Persons out driving early this Thanksgiving morning should prepare to encounter greatly reduces visibility in dense fog. Be especially cautious driving on Interstate 95, the Florida Turnpike, U.S. 1 and other state and county highways in the area.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use only your low beam headlights, and leave plenty of distance between your vehicle and the one ahead of you. Consider leaving early to give yourself plenty of time to safely arrive at your destination.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Indian River; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland St. Lucie
